meanings.definition: The act of beating a drum rhythmically.
meanings.sent1: During the parade, the drumbeatings echoed through the streets.
meanings.sent2: The drumbeatings at the concert were loud and energetic.
meanings.sent3: The drumbeatings in the music class made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The drumbeatings of rain on the roof sounded like a soothing lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The drumbeatings of the tribal drums signaled the start of the ceremony.

meanings.definition: The sound produced by beating a drum.
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic drumbeatings added a lively touch to the song.
meanings.sent2: The drumbeatings could be heard from far away during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The drumbeatings of the drummer were so loud that they startled the birds.
meanings.sent4: The drumbeatings of the heart quickened as the tension rose.
meanings.sent5: The drumbeatings of the war drums filled the air with anticipation.
